title: Scholarship
content: Will you not be able to secure a scholarship in the subsequent years even if you get a single backlog in any semester?

comments.body:
I believe the condition is that you shouldn't have any *active* backlogs. If you clear them, you should be eligible again. 

Someone correct me if I'm wrong.

If the source is rowlet owl, I think it’s sorted.
I remember my senior Advaith mentioning that if you get a backlog you won’t be eligible for scholarship throughout the course or something like that.
I love the trust you have in me but I'd still recommend confirming this with the COE or someone else. But I believe whatever I mentioned is mostly right.
